divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving Northwest on 291 Hwy when I noticed a white shiny object moving slowly across the sky. At first I thought it was a large plane, but it had no wings or tail. It looked like two oval-shaped objects with a piece connecting them in the center. As I watched, it stopped and went backwasrds, then forward again very quickly, then continued on its slow forward movement. This happened again, then I lost sight of it because I had to turn left at a light. I pulled over to the side of the road to see if I could find it again, but it was gone. Due to the fast jerky movements backward, then forward again, this could not have been a plane or helicopter. It moved too fast for that. The object was headed in an East-West direction at 40 degrees off the horizon. It looked very large. The sky was clear with no overcast.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Liberty
